Text:
Hello! Can anyone help with subtitles for this?
Avidemux won't extract the subs from this rip unfortunately...
Any language will do, I can translate via Google.
Thanks!

i can extract the subtitles for you from the dvdr
but it will take some minutes

ops sorry, i dont know how to do this, but the original DVD is posted here at piratebay:

http://thepiratebay.org/user/fitzox/

English subs:

http://www.allsubs.org/subs-download/il-capo-dei-capi-corleone-daniele-liotti-2007-6-3-5-4-2/3725884/

These English subtitles were translated from the Dutch subtitles using Google Translator, 
therefore you may find it funny or frustrating, depending on your mood :) 
but at least you'll get a pretty good idea of what is going on..
Totalt nice tunsind tak ! fed upload !!!
Tak, for serien og upload! Det kunne selv jeg ikke gĂ¸re bedre :-)
